title: Nanotechnology Basic Research Project: Undergraduate Research Experience Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science (physics/chemistry) and engineering concepts, experience using simple laboratory equipment
context.additional_context: Nanotechnology application case studies linked to social studies with online-offline integrated learning in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can design and conduct experiments for analyzing nanomaterial properties (e.g., scanning electron microscopy observation).
Learners can analyze the societal impacts of nanotechnology applications in environmental/energy fields.
Learners can produce research outcomes as reports/presentation materials through collaborative research.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
